Elastic is a search company built on a free and open heritage. Anyone can use Elastic products and solutions to get started quickly and frictionlessly. Elastic offers three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security, built on one technology stack that can be deployed anywhere. From finding documents to monitoring infrastructure to hunting for threats, Elastic makes data usable in real time and at scale. Thousands of organizations worldwide, including Cisco, eBay, Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, The Mayo Clinic, NASA, The New York Times, Wikipedia, and Verizon, use Elastic to power mission-critical systems. Founded in 2012, Elastic is a distributed company with Elasticians around the globe and is publicly traded on the NYSE under the symbol ESTC. Learn more at elastic.co.

Elastic is seeking a Director of Demand Generation Events/Webinars to lead the team globally. This is a new role and outstanding chance to create a visible impact in an exciting, fast-growing business. In this role, you will be responsible for driving the strategy and events planning process, aligning with partner groups, and leading the execution of the plan. This role will be leading a team of events managers that are geographically dispersed around the globe.What you will do:
Define demand generation events strategy including building an investment model with triggers for event activities and prioritization of resourcesBuild results-oriented event plans and goalsThink big to deliver new insights and creative approachesExecute events at the highest level and continuously raise the bar on content and the customer experienceBuild processes for repeatability and scalability of events activitiesAlign event activities with business priorities and across partner groupsQuantify business results of all activities with data-driven analysis and reportingRun and lead a high-functioning teamDevelop a center of excellence for virtual and live event execution, establish standard methodologies, and facilitate replication of best practices across all regionsWhat you will bring:
Minimum 7 years of events marketing experience in a technology environmentProven experience leading an events team and being responsible for large-scale eventsA career path that demonstrates increasing levels of responsibility and shown success delivering measurable results and building strong teams.Proven ability to build strong collaborative partnerships with partners and virtual teams.Superior oral and written communication skills with an executive level audience and an innate attention to detail.Bachelor’s degree in business, marketing, technology or a relevant field of study.

Additional Information - We Take Care of Our People

As a distributed company, diversity drives our identity.  Whether you’re looking to launch a new career or grow an existing one, Elastic is the type of company where you can balance great work with great life. Your age is only a number. It doesn’t matter if you’re just out of college or your children are; we need you for what you can do.
We strive to have parity of benefits across regions and while regulations differ from place to place, we believe taking care of our people is the right thing to do.
